alert.note: Alert for Neshoba (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 13 at 9:38AM CDT until March 14 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Mississippi... Pearl River Near Carthage affecting Leake County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Pearl River Above Philadelphia affecting Neshoba County. Pearl River At Edinburg affecting Leake County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pearl River Above Philadelphia. * WHEN...Until Monday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 AM CDT Sunday the stage was 13.1 feet and falling. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage this afternoon and continue falling to 11.7 feet Friday morning. - Flood stage is 13 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 am CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Mon Tue Wed Pearl River Philadelphi 13.0 13.1 Sun 8 am CDT 12.8 12.6 12.3 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued late tonight at 1245 AM CDT.
